Public Remarks: Large private 70' x 170' estate-sized lot. Well cared for family home. This lovely home has a grand foyer entry with formal dining & formal living room on opposite sides. Good size kitchen plus WOK Kitchen. Bay nook & family with French doors to your fully fenced backyard with lane access with triple car garage plus additional parking. Pot lights, newly sanded hardwood floors and crown mouldings throughout main floor. Upper level has 4 large ensuites. Lower level features media room, games room and 3 bedrooms.  Open House Sunday Jan. 8th, 2-4pm.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate. Buyer to verify. Open House Sunday Jan. 8th, 2-4pm.

Public Remarks: Gracious sun-filled home set on spectacular 13,046 sqft property on 'THE CRESCENT', Vancouver's most distinctive and prestigious address, in the heart of 1st Shaughnessy. Nestled behind a private gated entry, amidst spectacular gardens, this hidden treasure offers tremendous privacy & serenity. Quality built in 1990, with extraordinary attention to detail, extensive mouldings, vaulted ceilings, Oak floors, custom cabinetry and infloor radiant heat. Large principal rooms ideal for entertaining and relaxed family living, 3 bedrooms, office, playroom. Kitchen, family room & dining room open to expansive patio. Attached 2 car garage and abundant storage. Close to S. Granville shops, Van Lawn & Tennis Club, and the best schools.
Realtor Remarks: NOTE $25,000 SELLING BONUS! PLEASE PHONE OR TEXT FOR APPOINTMENT (PREFER NO TOUCHBASE).

Public Remarks: For all you weary global travelers looking for tranquil, luxury living & the jet setting life style of Vancouver at your fingertips –  Southlands Estate - a modern French Country Estate on a private acreage enjoys endless ocean & Boundary Bay park views & a most relaxed existence.  30 minutes from Vancouver, located across Beach Grove Golf course this impressive, gated estate & superb landscape blends effortlessly w/ the surrounding park grounds, underscored by exquisite stone paved driveways & sun-drenched patios. Stunning architecture w/ timeless open design on a grand scale featuring a dramatic 20 ft. living room ceiling, glamorous fireplace overlooking endless views of Mount Baker. Southlands Estate easily counts amongst the most prestigious acreages in the Metro Vancouver…

Unprecedented opportunity to purchase a Key 5 Acre Future Development Property on 208 street in the Smith Plan in rapidly developing Willoughby Heights, Langley. Township anticipates 4th reading by Spring 2017. Land is High & Dry with 330' frontage and no creeks with current Draft Plan showing mixed Single Family/Townhomes. Properties of this size are extremely rare. Assemblies in the Willougby Heights area are proving difficult and at a much higher premium per acre. Invest now and prosper immensely in one of the fastest developing areas in Canada only 25 minutes to Vancouver boasting excellent shopping, amenities and transportation routes. Showings by appointment only. Now accepting offers.
Realtor Remarks: Please touchbase before walking property. Buyer or buyers agent to verify development potential with Township of Langley before writing offer. Now accepting offers.

Public Remarks: Gorgeous custom built home in the prestigious South Granville! Huge lot 72'x183', total 13,322 sqft, living area 6063 sf. Brand new house built in 2014 with elegant design, finest material and workmanship. This home features 6 bdrms and 7.5 baths, grand foyer w/marble ensuites bdrms are upstairs. Basement has a huge recreation room and wet bar, temperature controlled wine cellar, home theatre room, 2 guest room & Jacuzzi. Huge deck on the upper floor has a good view. It is walking distance to school catchment: Maple Grove Elementary and Magee Secondary. MUST SEE!
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate. Buyers to verify.

Owner Name: SOLUS TRUST COMPANY LTD AND CHRISTOPHER SCOTT JOHNSON
Public Remarks: Over one acre lot in the most exclusive enclave of the The Crescent at the best location in Shaughnessy Vancouver, this beautiful, second to none architectural treasure was designed by the noted architects Maclure & Fox in 1911 for Water C. Nichol, a former Lieutenant Governor of BC. This first class Neo-Tudor spectacular solid heritage is recognized and protected by the local government, both the garden and the whole house. This Neo Tudor spectacular solid heritage contains features of central grand living hall, high beamed ceiling on the main floor, fireplaces everywhere, leaded windows, built-in book shelves, super spacious and elegant living room and dining room.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approx. Buyer to verify is important. Please call agent to make an appointment for showing.
